thread.title: Mystery man wins $10 million with scratcher lottery ticket in Cameron Park
thread.title_full: Mystery man wins $10 million with scratcher lottery ticket in Cameron Park

author:
Bill Lindelof 
blindelof@sacbee.com
title: Mystery man wins $10 million with scratcher lottery ticket in Cameron Park
text:
February 21, 2017 11:41 AM Mystery man wins $10 million with scratcher lottery ticket in Cameron Park California Gold scrather ticket. California Lottery i 
By Bill Lindelof 
A mystery man has purchased a $10 million scratcher lottery ticket in Cameron Park. 
Kulbir Grewal bought the winning $30 California Gold Scratchers ticket at Vineyard Market, 2643 Cameron Park Drive. 
The lucky millionaire declined all media interviews and the California Lottery will not release any more information about Grewal.
